children.subject: I am in Data 100 right now and have talked to a few friends who have taken ee127. Data 100 gets you VERY comfortable with using common tools like numpy, pandas. From my research EE127 is not as useful for ML stuff (at least the general consensus on reddit is that 126 is better prep for 189 than 127). My friends also mentioned that EE127 was not useful in the way that it was hyped up to be.

history.content: <md>Data 100 projects look great on a resume and give you great skills for data science internships. It is a much more practical industry focused class.</md>

How do these two classes compare in terms of:

1) ML-related research positions

2) Internships (Which class has more impressive projects, plus which class has more relevant interview content for DS based internships?)

3) Workload

4) Enjoyability. 

P.S. Will taking Data 100 next summer still be useful for internship apps? (pertaining to projects on the resume)
history.subject: Data 100 vs EECS 127
